title: Kickstarter Projects Scraper
description: Scrape project data from Kickstarter. Provide a Kickstarter discover URL or use category/sort filters.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Kickstarter URL (e.g., https://www.kickstarter.com/discover/advanced?category_id=16&sort=magic).

category.title: Category
category.description: Filter by Kickstarter category (Art, Comics, Design, Fashion, Film, Food, Games, Music, Photography, Publishing, Tech, Theater). Leave empty for all categories.

sort.title: Sort By
sort.description: Sort order: magic (recommended), popularity, newest, end_date, most_funded.

collectDetails.title: Collect project details
collectDetails.description: If enabled, scraper opens project detail pages for full information (slower but more complete data).

results_wanted.title: Maximum number of projects
results_wanted.description: The maximum number of projects to collect.

max_pages.title: Maximum number of pages
max_pages.description: A safety cap on the number of 'Load More' clicks to perform.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use Apify Proxy to avoid blocking (residential recommended for Kickstarter).
